00012 #else

00017 #include "SDL.h"
00018 #include "SDL_image.h"

00020 #include "../DisplayObject.h"
00021 
00022 #include <math.h>
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <list>
00025 #include <iostream>
00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 namespace TenUI {       
00029 
00030         class Line : public DisplayObject {
00031         protected:
00032                 int     x2, y2;
00033                 float   lineColor[3];
00034                 float   lineWidth;
00035                 
00036                 virtual void calcCenterX(){
00037                         centerx = (double)((x2>x)?x:x2)+scalex*(double)w/2.0;
00038                 }
00039 
00040                 virtual void calcCenterY(){
00041                         centery = (double)((y2>y)?y:y2)+scaley*(double)h/2.0;
00042                 }
00043                 
00044         public: 
00045                 // constructor
00046                 Line(DisplayObject *p,  int x=0, int y=0, int x2=0, int y2=0, 
00047                                                                 float r=0.0, float g=0.0, float b=0.0, 
00048                                                                 float lineWidth=0.0, 
00049                                                                 double rot=0.0, double s=1.0, double o=1.0)
00050                         :DisplayObject(p,x,y,rot,s,o){                  
00051                         
00052                         setX(x);                        
00053                         setY(y);
00054                         setX2(x2);                      
00055                         setY2(y2);
00056                         
00057                         lineColor[0]=r;
00058                         lineColor[1]=g;
00059                         lineColor[2]=b;
00060 
00061                         this->lineWidth = lineWidth;
00062                 }       
00063                 virtual ~Line(){}
00064                         
00065                 // game loop (and init) function
00066                 virtual void init(){}
00067                 virtual void update(){} 
00068                 
00069                 void preDraw(){
00070                         DisplayObject::preDraw();
00071                         
00072                         glEnable(GL_SCISSOR_TEST);
00073                         
00074                         //int gx;
00075                         //int gy;
00076                         //localToGlobalCoord(left, bottom, &gx, &gy);
00077                         
00078                         glScissor(      getGlobalX()-((x2>x)?0:w), 
00079                                                 getGlobalY()-((y2>y)?0:h), 
00080                                                 w, 
00081                                                 h);
00082                                                                         
00083                 }
00084                 virtual void draw(){
00085                         glColor4f(lineColor[0], lineColor[1], lineColor[2],(GLfloat)this->opacity);
00086                         glLineWidth(lineWidth);
00087 
00088                         // draw line
00089                         glBegin(GL_LINES);                              
00090                                 glVertex2d((GLdouble)((x2>x)?left:left+w),(GLdouble)((y2>y)?bottom:bottom+h));
00091                                 glVertex2d((GLdouble)((x2>x)?left+w:left),(GLdouble)((y2>y)?bottom+h:bottom));                                  
00092                         glEnd();
00093                 }
00094                 void postDraw(){
00095                         glDisable(GL_SCISSOR_TEST);
00096 
00097                         DisplayObject::postDraw();
00098                 }
00099                 
00100                 int getX2(){
00101                         return x2;
00102                 }
00103                 
00104                 int getY2(){
00105                         return y2;
00106                 }
00107                 
00108 
00109                 virtual void setX(int nx){      
00110                         x = nx;
00111                                                 
00112                         // Recalculate centerx 
00113                         centerx = (double)((x2>x)?x:x2)+scalex*(double)w/2.0;
00114                 }       
00115 
00116                 virtual void setY(int ny){
00117                         y = ny;
00118                         
00119                         // Recalculate centery
00120                         centery = (double)((y2>y)?y:y2)+scaley*(double)h/2.0;
00121                 }
00122                 
00123                 void setX2(int nx){
00124                         x2 = nx;
00125                         DisplayObject::setW((x2>x)?x2-x:x-x2);
00126                 }
00127                 
00128                 void setY2(int ny){
00129                         y2 = ny;
00130                         DisplayObject::setH((y2>y)?y2-y:y-y2);
00131                 }                               
00132                 
00133                 virtual void setW(int nw){
00134                         DisplayObject::setW(nw);
00135                         x2 = x+nw;
00136                 }
00137 
00138                 virtual void setH(int nh){
00139                         DisplayObject::setH(nh);
00140                         y2 = y+nh;
00141                 }               
00142                 
00143                 const float* getLineColor(){
00144                         return lineColor;
00145                 }
00146 
00147                 void setLineColor(float r, float g, float b){
00148                         lineColor[0] = r;
00149                         lineColor[1] = g;
00150                         lineColor[2] = b;
00151                 }
00152                 
00153                 void setLineColor(float (&colors)[3]){
00154                         lineColor[0] = colors[0];
00155                         lineColor[1] = colors[1];
00156                         lineColor[2] = colors[2];
00157                 }
00158                 
00159                 float getLineWidth(){
00160                         return lineWidth;
00161                 }
00162                 
00163                 void setLineWidth(float lw){
00164                         lineWidth = lw;
00165                 }
00166                                 
00167         };
00168 
00169 }
